div.p: You can get the latest MyCoRe version directly using Maven or from the MyCoRe-Artifactory. Alternatively you can download the MIR application, an out-of-the-box solution for institutional repositories.
Besides the official current release, you can also use our long term support release (LTS) 2017.06, which is supported til next LTS (ca. 1 year).
The latest sources can be downloaded from the MyCoRe Repository at GitHub:
MyCoRe uses Maven together with Jenkins as Continuous Integration environment. Successful Builds are published in our Maven repository:
